title: Google Pixel 1 bootloop /w screen flashing
content:
Out of nothing the screen of my Google Pixel went black while I was using Maps and played music over BT. The song played for some more seconds and then stopped. The Pixel rebooted but couldn't start properly. What I saw next and see since then is pretty weird. Pixel tries to start (white screen with centered Google logo) but this screen just comes up for a second (Google logo is anywhere on the screen, sometimes there is none at all) and then it disappears with some crazy pixels, goes black, tries again (and again and again...)
I do get to the bootloader menu (with the options start, restart bootloader, recovery mode, barcodes, power off) but none of that helps.

Any recommendations?
